mapper.select: SELECT tu.user_id, tu.user_name, tu.user_nickname, tu.user_email, tu.user_pwd, tu.user_img_url, tu.role_id, tr.role_type, tu.created_date, tu.created_id, tu.updated_date, tu.updated_id FROM tb_user tu LEFT JOIN tb_role tr ON tu.role_id = tr.role_id WHERE tu.user_email = #{userEmail}
